alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 12:47PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota County through 115 PM MDT... At 1246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Wolf Creek Housing, or 13 miles east of Pine Ridge, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wakpamni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
